short_summary: Meeting space and catering services will be required for the CPTPP Commission
description: Public Works & Government Services Canada (PWGSC) Events and Conference Management Services, on behalf of Global Affairs Canada (GAC), will be hosting the 2024 Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) Commission in Vancouver, British Columbia.
duration_in_months: The event will take place from November 25 - 28, 2024.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Conference Space and Meeting Facilities

**Reference Number**: WS4540534088-Doc4544446337

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal

**Publication Date**: 2024-05-01
**Tender Closing Date**: 2024-05-16T14:00:00

**Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
[Address information available upon request]

**End User Entities**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
[Address information available upon request]

**Event Overview**
Public Works & Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of Global Affairs Canada (GAC), intends to host the 2024 Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) Commission in Vancouver, British Columbia. This event will take place from November 25-28, 2024, and requires meeting space and catering services.

**Proponents' Requirements**
The required services include:

* Meeting space and facilities
* Catering services

**Scope of Work**
The selected service provider will be responsible for providing meeting space and catering services for the 2024 CPTPP Commission event. The successful bidder will be required to work closely with event organizers to ensure a smooth and successful event.

**Evaluation Criteria**
The evaluation process will be based on the Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

**Important Information**
* The tender is open to all qualified suppliers.
* Bids must be submitted electronically through the Ariba Discovery website by the specified closing date and time.
* Late bids will not be accepted.

To receive more information regarding this tender, including invitation to bid and technical specifications, please visit the Ariba Discovery website located at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19569562?extsite=MTk1Njk1NjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
